intro: Oreocharis agnesiae, commonly known as the Agnesia's oreocharis, is a rare flowering plant native to the mountainous regions of Yunnan Province in China. It belongs to the Orchidaceae family and is characterized by its small, delicate flowers that typically bloom in shades of white and pink. The plant has a compact growth habit with a rosette of narrow, grass-like leaves. It thrives in cool, moist environments and is often found in rocky or shaded habitats. Due to its limited distribution and habitat specificity, it is considered a vulnerable species.
